vision.notes: Visual capabilities of Ctenophthalmidae fleas are not mentioned in the provided text.

chemoreception.notes: Fleas in general rely on chemoreception to find hosts. While not explicitly stated, it is inferred as a common sensory modality for host detection and potentially mate finding.

mechanoreception.notes: Fleas likely use mechanoreceptors to detect vibrations or air currents related to host presence.
